ai-mil7.7.10:1.1_0: “Venerable sir, what are the two factors should be cared by one of them?”
ai-mil7.7.10:1.2_0: “Just as the boys of Kāḷigodhā the tree shrine, and the trees scales,
ai-mil7.7.10:1.3_0: In the same way, when one who is habitually established in faith, ethics, learning, generosity, and wisdom by sharing the path of faith, ethics, learning, generosity, and wisdom, he should establish his heart on the appropriate occasions.
ai-mil7.7.10:1.4_0: This is the first kind of stinginess.
ai-mil7.7.10:2.1_0: Furthermore, a starting softwood shouts, bringing back what is needed.
ai-mil7.7.10:2.2_0: In the same way, one who lives in a debt, annihilationistry, one whose body is the most important thing, one whose livelihood and causes such things, one who they experience the ultimate goal of the spiritual life, the having attained that conqueror of their own conquerority, the one who they experience the ultimate goal of their essence, and one who lives having attained the highest fruit of their deeds.
ai-mil7.7.10:2.3_0: This is the second way to get hold of a robe.
ai-mil7.7.10:2.4_0: The Buddha has said, great king, that when the Divinities of the Gods
ai-mil7.7.10:3.4_0: they’re not ascetics, they just think they are.
ai-mil7.7.10:6.1_0: The sixth sub-chapter on monkeys is finished.
